description: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) is the number of weighted lattice paths in L_n having k (1,0)-steps. These are paths that start at (0,0), end on the horizontal axis and whose steps are of the following four kinds: a (1,0)-step with weight 1; a (1,0)-step with weight 2; a (1,1)-step with weight 2; a (1,-1)-step with weight 1. The weight of a path is the sum of the weights of its steps.
